oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Davco Bulletin Board - Audition
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Audition for WSM program Davco Bulletin Board, original broadcast date unknown, 6 a.m. Year is likely 1955 based on records played during program. Program features Louie Buck playing pre-recorded music and reading fishing and weather reports. Sponsored by Davco Granulated Fertilizer.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chet Atkins; Eddy Arnold; Stuart Hamblen; Masters Family
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Fig Leaf Rag) (Chet Atkins) (recording) -- Opening statement (Louie Buck) -- The Kentuckian Song (Eddy Arnold) (recording) -- Davco Granulated Fertilizer commercial (Louie Buck) -- Ole Pappy Time (Stuart Hamblen) (recording) -- Davco bulletin board (Louie Buck) -- Fishing report (Louie Buck) -- Weather report (Louie Buck) -- Coming To Carry Me Home (Masters Family) (recording) -- Davco Granulated Fertilizer commercial (Louie Buck) -- Theme (Fig Leaf Rag) (Chet Atkins) (recording) -- Closing statement (Louie Buck)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Davison Chemical Company; Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Atkins, Chet; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Hamblen, Stuart, 1908-1989; Masters Family (Musical group)
